title: LEAGUE DISCONNECTING EVERYONE?
body:
Umm.. i think the servers have crashed .. was in a game and 2 players got cut out.. then i think all of us.. (we had our jungle and support dc.  then me and our mid.. (top lane) umm just wondering if others are having this.. we are on skype so we know who has dcd.. please fix this.

date and time 5/03/2015 - 2:56am - Melbourne

replies.body:
found this posted on ther service statis under the game server 


"Network Operations – a few seconds ago
We have confirmed an issue with our backbone provider and we are working on getting the connectivity back.
40 minutes ago
Network Operations — Currently we're seeing issues with players getting disconnected from Games. We're working to fix this and will provide further updates on this page."

so they are fixing the issue.. will take time just bare with them
NEW MESSAGE BEFORE u click launch, riot is aware of the issue and fixing it.. so all we can do is wait.
yep mate same time as you so must be a server issue.. hope they get it fixed and of course the match will be wiped from our list of match history.. and ranked will be closed again.
game crashed, unable to contect to server. firewall message error. was in the middle of the game. had no previous problems connecting - dced around 2:56am
same here except mine we witnessed players dropping and had 3 others on skype in my match.. and we all were confused..  but looks like the match will be wiped from the server.. GG

yeah i have a feeling that there is an issue on there servers atm that they are trying to fix.. i know about servers and networking.. and 1 lil thing can cause a huge issue on anything.. 

but yeah probly be like 20-30 mins again.. like it was 2 weeks ago. had this same issue.. 

BTW my team was dominating lol.. MAO KAI KICKS REKSAIs ASS.. found out by playing mao kai top.. vsing him.. was dominating lanes.. and yeah..we had a great team comp.. sigh..

Game dc'd, haven't been able to reconnect since, restarted twice, have had to kill the league process to do anything
Was my last promo, gr8
Yes I have just been disconnected from a game. Just before that my support and adc dced and the enemy nidalee said '3 afk push mid'... thats when I dced. Perhaps it is a server issue.
